name: DrillBot (VeryLancer)
description:
Unique pixel-art style puzzle platformer game! Challenge yourself to finish all 8 levels and reach the goal! 

You are playing as a robot, which can launch Drill missiles to dig the way! 

Almost everything was created within the GameJam week!

If you would like to support me you can:

Donate on PayPal

Sound Effects are from:

https://freesound.org/people/Soundholder/sounds/425334/

https://freesound.org/people/ProjectsU012/sounds/334268/

https://freesound.org/people/plasterbrain/sounds/399095/

https://freesound.org/people/timgormly/sounds/170144/

And Music:

https://patrickdearteaga.com
